Interface UpdateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericServer, RMIServer, SocketServer

  • Method Details

    • onError

      void onError(UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Handles an error condition for the specified match.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match associated with the error
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during error handling

    • updateGameCreated

      void updateGameCreated(int level, List<Deck> showableDecks, ArrayList<Player> players, int hourglass, int surrender, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Updates the state of a game when it is created with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      level - The current level of the game.
      showableDecks - A list of decks that can be shown during the game.
      players - A list of players participating in the game.
      hourglass - The number of hourglasses available in the game.
      surrender - The surrender state of the game.
      matchId - The unique identifier for the game match.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the update process.

    • depositThingInHand

      void depositThingInHand(String playerNickname, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Deposits the item currently held by the player into the designated storage or container associated with the specific match.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player performing the deposit action
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match in which the action is being performed
      Throws:
      Exception - if the deposit operation fails due to invalid inputs, lack of held item, or internal system errors

    • completeBuildingPhase

      void completeBuildingPhase(UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Completes the building phase for a specific match. This method finalizes or progresses the designated building phase of a match identified by its unique match ID. It may throw an exception in case of errors or invalid conditions during the process.
      Parameters:
      matchId - The unique identifier of the match whose building phase is to be completed.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the building phase cannot be completed successfully due to unforeseen circumstances or invalid input.

    • pickTileLMR

      void pickTileLMR(int tileIndex, String playerNickname, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Allows a player to pick a tile in a game using the Left-Middle-Right (LMR) tile selection system.
      Parameters:
      tileIndex - the index of the tile to be selected
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player making the selection
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match where the tile is being selected
      Throws:
      Exception - if the tile selection fails due to invalid parameters or game constraints

    • insertTileLMR

      void insertTileLMR(int tileIndex, int r, int c, int rotation, String playerNickname, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Inserts a tile into the game with specified parameters. This method places the tile with a given rotation at the specified row and column on the game board. It also associates the move with a player's nickname and the match identifier.
      Parameters:
      tileIndex - the index of the tile being inserted, representing its type or ID
      r - the row on the board where the tile is to be placed
      c - the column on the board where the tile is to be placed
      rotation - the rotation of the tile, typically specified in degrees or steps
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player making the move
      matchId - the unique identifier for the match during which the move is made
      Throws:
      Exception - if the insertion violates game rules or conditions, or for other errors

    • pickLittleDeckLMR

      void pickLittleDeckLMR(int deckIndex, String playerNickname, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Allows a player to pick a specific little deck based on the provided index. This method links the player's choice of deck to a specific match.
      Parameters:
      deckIndex - The index of the little deck that the player wants to pick.
      playerNickname - The nickname of the player picking the deck.
      matchId - The unique identifier of the match in which the deck is being picked.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the operation fails, such as due to invalid parameters or game state issues.

    • addAlienOrHumansLMR

      void addAlienOrHumansLMR(String playerNickname, boolean wantAlien, AlienColor alienColor, int row, int column, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Adds an alien or human character to the game based on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player who is adding the character
      wantAlien - true if an alien is being added, false if a human is being added
      alienColor - the color of the alien to be added, ignored if adding a human
      row - the row position where the character should be added
      column - the column position where the character should be added
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match in which the character is to be added
      Throws:
      Exception - if the addition fails due to invalid parameters or game constraints

    • messageToChooseSubship

      void messageToChooseSubship(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Sends a message to the player prompting them to choose a submarine ship from the provided options.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to whom the message is sent
      subShips - a list of lists containing SpaceShipTile objects representing the available submarine ship options
      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the submarine ship selection
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the process

    • ChooseSubship

      void ChooseSubship(String playerNickname, ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips, int choice, int waste, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Allows a player to choose a subship from a given list of subships based on their selection.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player making the choice
      subShips - a list of lists containing the subships available for selection
      choice - the index of the subship chosen by the player
      waste - the value representing unwanted or unused parts during the process
      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the process or session
      Throws:
      Exception - if the selection is invalid or an error occurs during the process

    • removeSingleTile

      void removeSingleTile(String playerNickname, int row, int column, boolean fromMistake, int waste, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Removes a single tile from the game board based on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player performing the operation
      row - the row index of the tile to be removed
      column - the column index of the tile to be removed
      fromMistake - indicates whether the removal is due to a mistake
      waste - the waste value associated with the removal process
      uuid - the unique identifier for the tile removal instance
      Throws:
      Exception - if the tile removal fails due to invalid inputs or other errors

    • addTileToWaitList

      void addTileToWaitList(String playerNickname, int TileIndex, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Adds a tile to the waitlist for a specified player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player to whom the tile will be added
      TileIndex - the index of the tile to be added
      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the tile
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while adding the tile to the waitlist

    • setPlayerPosInFlightBoard

      void setPlayerPosInFlightBoard(String playerNickname, int pos, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Updates the player's position on the flight board within a specific match.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player whose position is to be updated
      pos - the new position of the player on the flight board
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match in which the player's position is being updated
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the player's position

    • endbuilding

      void endbuilding(String playerNickname, int positionWhereToGo, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Ends the current building phase for a player in a match and transitions to the specified position.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player ending the building phase
      positionWhereToGo - the position to which the player will transition after ending the building phase
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match where this action is taking place
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation

    • endBuildingPhaseForAll

      void endBuildingPhaseForAll(UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Ends the building phase for all participants in the match identified by the given match ID.
      Parameters:
      matchId - The unique identifier of the match for which the building phase needs to be ended.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while ending the building phase.

    • sendPenalty

      void sendPenalty(int penalty, String type, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Sends a penalty for a specific match and type.
      Parameters:
      penalty - the value of the penalty to be sent
      type - the type of the penalty (e.g., foul, misconduct)
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while sending the penalty

    • abandonedShipTakenActivate

      void abandonedShipTakenActivate(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posPers, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Activates the abandoned ship logic when a specific condition is met.
      Parameters:
      player - The player triggering the abandoned ship activation.
      posPers - A 2D list representing position and persistence data required for the activation process.
      matchId - The unique identifier of the ongoing match.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the activation process.

    • updateCardUse

      void updateCardUse(Card card, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Updates the usage information of a card in the context of a specific match.
      Parameters:
      card - the card object that needs its usage details updated

      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the operation
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the handling of goods

    • removeAlien

      void removeAlien(String username, int r, int c, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Removes an alien entity identified by its username and UUID from a specified position on a grid.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the alien entity to be removed
      r - the row index in the grid where the alien is located
      c - the column index in the grid where the alien is located
      uuid - the unique identifier for the alien entity
      Throws:
      Exception - if the removal operation fails

    • lostBatteries

      void lostBatteries(Player p, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteriesToAct, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Handles the process of removing batteries associated with a specific player or based on certain conditions provided in the batteriesToAct. This method may also utilize the unique identifier (UUID) as necessary.
      Parameters:
      p - The player for whom batteries are being processed.
      batteriesToAct - A list of lists containing integers representing the specific batteries to act upon.
      uuid - The unique identifier that may be used to identify the context or entity related to this operation.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the process.
